key.name: eager
key.description: If true, the given command will be executed not only every time the timer laps, but also when the timer is first enabled.

key.name: period
key.description: Sets the amount of time that must pass between each execution of the command.

key.name: command
key.description: Command that gets called every time the timer laps.

key.name: max-interval
key.description: Set maximum selectable time of the slider (in minutes). Use only values greater zero.
